caption.p: Distribution of the analyzed Senecio madagascariensis populations. The map was performed with Diva Gis ( https://www.diva-gis.org/) software using "Administrative Layers" for Argentina. The GIS shape files were obtained from GADM database ( https://www.gadm.org, version 3.6) in DIVA GIS ( https://www.diva-gis.org/gData).
